00001 #include "OryxManager.h"
00002 #include "std_msgs/String.h"
00003 #include <oryx_manager/oryx_managerConfig.h>
00004 
00005 ros::Publisher heartbeatPublisher;
00006 bool remoteConnection=false;
00007 int remoteConnectionAttempts=0;
00008 
00009 void heartbeatCallback(const ros::TimerEvent&){
00010         if (remoteConnection)remoteConnectionAttempts++;
00011         else remoteConnectionAttempts=0;
00012         if(remoteConnectionAttempts <10){
00013                 std_msgs::String msg;
00014                 msg.data= "Okay";
00015                 heartbeatPublisher.publish(msg);
00016         }
00017 }
00018 
00019 void batteryCallback(const oryx_msgs::Battery::ConstPtr& msg){
00020         if(msg->voltage <2.2) ROS_WARN_STREAM("Battery Node " << msg->node << " is low. Shut off soon." );
00021         if(msg->voltage < 2.1 && msg->voltage >1.0){
00022                 ROS_ERROR_STREAM("Battery Node " << msg->node << " is at " << msg->voltage <<". Shutting Down...");
00023                 std_msgs::String msg;
00024                 msg.data= "Shut Down";
00025                 heartbeatPublisher.publish(msg);
00026                 sleep(10);
00027                 ROS_ERROR_STREAM("Shutting Down Now");
00028                 system("sudo halt now");
00029         }
00030 
00031 }
00032 
00033 void temperatureCallback(const oryx_msgs::Temperature::ConstPtr& msg){
00034         if(msg->temperature > msg->danger_Temp){
00035                 ROS_WARN_STREAM("NODE " << msg->temperature_node << " TEMPERATURE IS DANGEROUSLY HIGH");
00036         }
00037         else if(msg->temperature > msg->warning_Temp){
00038                 ROS_WARN_STREAM("NODE " << msg->temperature_node << " TEMPERATURE IS APPROACHING DANGEROUS TEMPERATURES");
00039         }
00040 }
00041 
00042 void reconfigureCallback(oryx_manager::oryx_managerConfig &config, uint32_t level){
00043         remoteConnection=config.Remote_Connection;
00044 }
00045 
00046 void remoteConnectionCallback(const std_msgs::String::ConstPtr& msg){
00047         remoteConnectionAttempts=0;
00048 }
00049 
00050 int main(int argc, char** argv){
00051         //Intialize ROS node with name OryxManager
00052         ros::init(argc, argv, "OryxManager");
00053         ros::NodeHandle nh;
00054 
00055         //Create publisher that lets others know the robot is okay
00056         heartbeatPublisher      = nh.advertise<std_msgs::String>("/Heartbeat",1);
00057 
00058         //Publish a heartbeat at 10Hz
00059         ros::Timer heartbeatTimer = nh.createTimer(ros::Duration(.1),heartbeatCallback);
00060 
00061         //Listen to the temperatures, run temperatureCallback when one is heard
00062         ros::Subscriber tempSub = nh.subscribe("Temps",20,temperatureCallback);
00063 
00064         //Listen to voltages, run batteryCallback when one is heard
00065         ros::Subscriber batSub = nh.subscribe("Battery",10,batteryCallback);
00066 
00067         //Listen for remote computers. If remote connection is lost, rover will stop moving
00068         ros::Subscriber remoteConnectionHeartbeat
00069                 = nh.subscribe("/RemoteConnection",1,remoteConnectionCallback);
00070 
00071         //Begin dynamic_reconfigure server
00072         dynamic_reconfigure::Server<oryx_manager::oryx_managerConfig> server;
00073         dynamic_reconfigure::Server<oryx_manager::oryx_managerConfig>::CallbackType f;
00074 
00075         //Call reconfigureCallback when new dynamic reconfigure update received
00076         f = boost::bind(reconfigureCallback, _1 ,_2);
00077         server.setCallback(f);
00078 
00079         //Start Multithreading callback handler
00080         ros::AsyncSpinner spinner(4);
00081         spinner.start();
00082 
00083         //Wait for ROS to shutdown
00084         ros::waitForShutdown();
00085 }
